## Installation

### Install from source

You can install the development version of **sptorch** from [github](https://github.com/ai4city-hkust/sptorch) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ai4city-hkust/sptorch",
                         build_vignettes = TRUE,
                         dep = TRUE)
```
